Title: Information Disclosure in TYPO3 CMS
Description: Failing to properly check user permission on file storages, editors could gain knowledge of protected storages and its folders as well as using them in a file collection being rendered in the frontend. A valid backend user account is needed to exploit this vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.22, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.5
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.22 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.5
